TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class InputBindingCollection Implements IList
public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList

summary.span: Stellt eine geordnete Auflistung von -Objekten dar.

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alle Objekte, die Ableitung haben eine mit dem Namen .All objects that derive from have an named . Alle Objekte, die Ableitung haben eine mit dem Namen .All objects that derive from have an named . Jedoch wenn diese Sammlungen, in festgelegt sind [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], und klicken Sie dann die Elemente in der Auflistung von abgeleiteten Klassen werden müssen statt direct Objekte.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. Grund hierfür ist, einen öffentlichen Standardkonstruktor nicht unterstützt.This is because does not support a default public constructor. Daher Elemente in einer , wurde im festgelegt [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] in der Regel eine abgeleitete Klasse, die einen öffentlichen Standardkonstruktor, z. B. unterstützt oder .Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples Das folgende Beispiel erstellt eine und ordnet sie einer .The following example creates a and associates it with a . Die wird hinzugefügt, um die auf eine .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

span.span: This deviates from the standard implementation for , which should return the index where the new item was added to the collection.

Die wird hinzugefügt, um die auf eine .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] Der [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] Beispiel verwendet keine buchstäblich , aber aufgerufen wird, implizit von der [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] verarbeitungsunterstützung für Sammlungen.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. Ausführliche Informationen zum [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] und Sammlungen finden Sie unter [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
